Headline: #85 Central Temporary Northbound Reroute near Central/Fullerton-Altgeld
ShortDescription: NB 85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Fullerton, Austin, Diversey and Central due to, street blockage near Central/Fullerton-Altgeld.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Fullerton, Austin, Diversey and Central due to, street blockage near Central/Fullerton-Altgeld.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #124 Navy Pier Temporary Reroute near Columbus/Wacker Drive
ShortDescription: 124 Navy Pier buses temp. rerouted NB: Michigan, Ohio, Fairbanks and Illinois; SB: Grand, Fairbanks, Ontario and Michigan due to, street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#124 Navy Pier buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Columbus/Wacker Drive.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Ohio, Fairbanks and Illinois.

Southbound buses will operate via Grand, Fairbanks, Ontario and Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at Division
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing at Division due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing at Division due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
